Texts.Chs: 充满斗志，我带领他们到抵抗组织的藏身处，告诉他们如果他们不解决他们的分歧，我就把他们的头撞到一起。太聪明了！我觉得还不错！当然，我没有留下来确认，我不得不和绿手指会合，但我看到他们在我们离开的时候一起穿过了城镇广场。
Texts.Eng: Filled with positivity, I led them to the Resistance hideout and told them that if they didn't sort out their differences, I'd knock their heads together. So smart! Well, I think it went okay! I didn't stick around to find out for sure, of course, I had to meet back up with Greenfinger, but I saw them all marching together through the town square as we left.

Texts.Chs: 所以我想到了一个天才的主意！如果抵抗组织和科技发展部能够把事情说清楚，那么也许事情就能得到解决。我敢肯定大猿不是他们认为的那个恶棍，只要他们了解他就好了。所以我从我的房间挖了条隧道，找到了最近的科技发展部野战排。
Texts.Eng: So I hit upon a genius idea! If the Resistance and the Miniknog could just talk it out, then maybe things could get smoothed over. I'm sure Big Ape is not the villain they think, if only they'd get to know him. So I tunnelled out of my room and found the nearest Miniknog platoon.
